snippet.title: Balacera Brothers - a Run n' Gun Extravaganza - TRAILER
snippet.description:
Get it today! https://gamejolt.com/games/balacera_brothers/454570
Also on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1353550/Balacera_Brothers/
Read more: https://www.merso-x.com/
Balacera Brothers is a retro-styled run n' gun game full of color, energetic music, and fast-paced action!
Heroes Harold and Benny take a break from playing with their ska band to rid the world of the merciless Nugnur and its horde of evil skeletons!

Credits:
Programming: Merso X, Bloodbane
Music: dmledo (https://youtu.be/_63IxdJoGBs)
Story: Eric Setzke
Sound Effects: Sonniss LTD, Merso X, Stefanie Wunderlin
Narration: Stetson Turner
Patrons: Skip Wescott, oldmanwinters, Aaron Meredith, Paul Brown, James hollie, NintenJoe, Nielzabub, Bobby MacGibbon, Santino Black, Toben Alexander, Del & Angry, Bryan Sime, Daniel Jacquez, Luke Shaw, Butters, Andrey P, Ezequiel Fuentes Jr
Thanks: nsw25, oldmanwinters, the Chronocrash community

More Merso-X:
Website: https://www.merso-x.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Merso-X-Games-103070454576605
Instagram: www.instagram.com/merso_x_games/
Twitter: twitter.com/XMerso
Patreon: www.patreon.com/merso_x
